TextBlock.Text: AVENS: Mallow, my better 50 percent! Cassava is sending the last of the <color=orange>cannon</color> components. Soon (relatively speaking), we’ll know the <color=lightblue>Eye</color>’s precise location!
MALLOW: The thought of concluding our elders’ curious and challenging search increases my heart’s temperature, my love!
AVENS: Cassava tells me he and the <color=orange>Construction Yard</color> crew have determined a power setting we are not, under any circumstances, to go above.
MALLOW: I see! And am I right to think that, consequently, we’ll be ignoring that setting?
AVENS: I can posit with nearly 100 percent certainty our friends have accounted for our natures, so I suggest we do!
AVENS: Giving the <color=orange>Orbital Probe Cannon</color> all the power it can structurally withstand creates the greatest chance of finding the <color=lightblue>Eye of the universe</color>.
MALLOW: Yes, the probe must travel as fast as it can, as far as it can. I’ll make some adjustments!
